New Records: Bowden Francis threw a no-hitter into the sixth inning, allowing only one hit in seven innings.
Boston Red Sox managed just two hits in the game.
Key Match Events: Bowden Francis maintained a no-hit bid through five and a third innings.
Jarren Duran reached on an error in the fourth inning but was thrown out trying to steal second.
Others: The game resulted in a 2-0 victory for the Toronto Blue Jays over the Boston Red Sox.
